title.rendered: Cartoon characters Dora and Shiva have fun with Smile Foundation kids

content.rendered:
Nickelodeon TV character Dora and Shiva spent a fun filled day with children from a Mission Education centre at Mumbai. Both Dora and Shiva played with the children and clicked pictures with the children. It was a fun filled and exciting day for the children as they got to meet their favorite characters and interact with them. An outing as such does much good to the children and comes as a breath of fresh air by allowing the children to have fun outside of their classrooms.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which is committed to providing basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 400,000 children and their families every year, through more than 200 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 950 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
